1.caption_en:
A blank Minimal Viable Platform Canvas v5.0 template with three overlapping rings labeled "Desirability," "Viability," and "Feasibility" surrounding a central "Main Objective of the MVP" circle, plus perimeter sections for key assumptions (Consumer needs/wants, Producer needs/wants, Business-model, Solution) and "Tests & Validation" areas.

{
  "artifact_type": "template/diagram",
  "title": "Minimal Viable Platform Canvas",
  "version": "v5.0",
  "description": "Blank platform-design canvas showing three overlapping value-dimension rings and peripheral assumption/test sections for planning an MVP platform.",
  "canvas_layout": {
    "orientation": "landscape",
    "page_elements": [
      {
        "type": "ring",
        "id": "desirability_ring",
        "label": "DESIRABILITY",
        "position": "top-center",
        "color": "#9CC63D",
        "notes": "Large top ring with 'TESTS & VALIDATION' text at lower inner arc"
      },
      {
        "type": "ring",
        "id": "viability_ring",
        "label": "VIABILITY",
        "position": "bottom-left",
        "color": "#51C2C6",
        "notes": "Lower-left ring with 'TESTS & VALIDATION' at inner arc"
      },
      {
        "type": "ring",
        "id": "feasibility_ring",
        "label": "FEASIBILITY",
        "position": "bottom-right",
        "color": "#FFD230",
        "notes": "Lower-right ring with 'TESTS & VALIDATION' at inner arc"
      },
      {
        "type": "circle",
        "id": "central_objective",
        "label": "MAIN OBJECTIVE OF THE MVP",
        "position": "center",
        "color": "#FFFFFF",
        "border_color": "#2F4B56"
      },
      {
        "type": "text_block",
        "id": "key_consumer",
        "label": "KEY ASSUMPTIONS: CONSUMER NEEDS / WANTS",
        "position": "top-left",
        "notes": "Empty lined area for consumer assumptions"
      },
      {
        "type": "text_block",
        "id": "key_producer",
        "label": "KEY ASSUMPTIONS: PRODUCER NEEDS / WANTS",
        "position": "top-right",
        "notes": "Empty lined area for producer assumptions"
      },
      {
        "type": "text_block",
        "id": "key_business_model",
        "label": "KEY ASSUMPTIONS: BUSINESS-MODEL",
        "position": "middle-left",
        "notes": "Empty lined area for business-model assumptions"
      },
      {
        "type": "text_block",
        "id": "key_solution",
        "label": "KEY ASSUMPTIONS: SOLUTION",
        "position": "middle-right",
        "notes": "Empty lined area for solution assumptions"
      },
      {
        "type": "footer",
        "id": "footer_bar",
        "label": "MINIMAL VIABLE PLATFORM CANVAS v5.0",
        "position": "bottom",
        "notes": "Includes license icons, download URL, title input box, and small logos/QR at right"
      }
    ]
  },
  "detected_text": [
    "KEY ASSUMPTIONS",
    "CONSUMER NEEDS / WANTS",
    "PRODUCER NEEDS / WANTS",
    "DESIRABILITY",
    "TESTS & VALIDATION",
    "BUSINESS-MODEL",
    "SOLUTION",
    "KEY ASSUMPTIONS (€) KEY ASSUMPTIONS",
    "MAIN OBJECTIVE OF THE MVP",
    "VIABILITY",
    "FEASIBILITY",
    "MINIMAL VIABLE PLATFORM CANVAS v5.0",
    "TITLE"
  ],
  "colors": {
    "desirability": "#9CC63D",
    "viability": "#51C2C6",
    "feasibility": "#FFD230",
    "background": "#FFFFFF",
    "footer_background": "#2F4950"
  },
  "notes": "Template is empty/ready for input; rings represent desirability, viability, feasibility with related tests and validation; peripheral panels capture key assumptions for consumers, producers, business model, and solution."
}
